name: Nothing to Something
description:
You play as a povish girl who wants to turn her dream house into a reality. To do this she must daydream to learn the blueprints of objects found within the daydream world. After that, she must collect materials in her rundown house to get one step closer to achieving her goal. Slowly but surely, and through her hard work, she will live the life she always wanted.
